languages.text: "Мусор Фурибундуса. И я не только про эти развалины, которые нас громить собрались — я про остатки метеоритов, газовые скопления, обломки, что с верфи сбрасывают... все это сбивается вместе, и мелкие суда за ними прячутся, чтобы подстерегать только вышедшие из варпа суда".

"The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."
languages.original_text: "Мусор Фурибундуса. И я не только про эти развалины, которые нас громить собрались — я про остатки метеоритов, газовые скопления, обломки, что с верфи сбрасывают... все это сбивается вместе, и мелкие суда за ними прячутся, чтобы подстерегать только вышедшие из варпа суда".

traits.locale_text: "The refuse of Furibundus. And I am not talking about the wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, trash from the wharfs... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind them to harass the ships that come out of the warp."

"The refuse of Furibundus. And I am not talking about the wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, trash from the wharfs... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind them to harass the ships that come out of the warp."

"The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

"The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

"The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

languages.text: 「フリブンダスの屑が。これから攻撃を開始する残骸のことを言っているわけではない。隕石の残骸、ガス雲、造船所の廃棄物のことを指している…そして、その全てが塊となり、小さな艦船がそこに隠れ、歪みから出てくる艦船を狙っている」
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: 「フリブンダスの屑が。これから攻撃を開始する残骸のことを言っているわけではない。隕石の残骸、ガス雲、造船所の廃棄物のことを指している…そして、その全てが塊となり、小さな艦船がそこに隠れ、歪みから出てくる艦船を狙っている」

languages.text: « À cause des fameux déchets de Furibundus. Je ne parle pas des épaves qui sont sur le point de nous attaquer, mais des vestiges de météorites, des nuages de gaz et des pièces détachées qui traînent partout... Ils forment des amas et des vaisseaux de taille modeste se dissimulent derrière eux pour tendre des embuscades aux vaisseaux qui émergent du Warp. »
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: « À cause des fameux déchets de Furibundus. Je ne parle pas des épaves qui sont sur le point de nous attaquer, mais des vestiges de météorites, des nuages de gaz et des pièces détachées qui traînent partout... Ils forment des amas et des vaisseaux de taille modeste se dissimulent derrière eux pour tendre des embuscades aux vaisseaux qui émergent du Warp. »

languages.text: “是怒焰星系的垃圾。我指的不是那些准备开炮的垃圾，而是像那些陨石碎片、气体云、造船厂的破烂之类的垃圾……这堆垃圾黏在一起，那堆小破船就藏在它们后面，准备骚扰从亚空间中出现的飞船。”
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: “是怒焰星系的垃圾。我指的不是那些准备开炮的垃圾，而是像那些陨石碎片、气体云、造船厂的破烂之类的垃圾……这堆垃圾黏在一起，那堆小破船就藏在它们后面，准备骚扰从亚空间中出现的飞船。”

languages.text: «La morralla de Furibundus. Y no me refiero a esas chatarras que están a punto de abrir fuego, sino a los restos de meteoritos, las nubes de gas, los desechos de los astilleros... Todo eso se amontona y las naves pequeñas se esconden detrás para hostigar a aquellas que acaban de salir de la disformidad».
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: «La morralla de Furibundus. Y no me refiero a esas chatarras que están a punto de abrir fuego, sino a los restos de meteoritos, las nubes de gas, los desechos de los astilleros... Todo eso se amontona y las naves pequeñas se esconden detrás para hostigar a aquellas que acaban de salir de la disformidad».

languages.text: "Der Müll von Furibundus. Und ich rede nicht von diesen Wracks, die gleich das Feuer eröffnen werden, ich meine die Überreste von Meteoriten, Gaswolken, Abfall von den Schiffswerften ... Das alles ballt sich zusammen, und die kleineren Schiffe verstecken sich dahinter, um Schiffe zu attackieren, die aus dem Warp auftauchen."
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: "Der Müll von Furibundus. Und ich rede nicht von diesen Wracks, die gleich das Feuer eröffnen werden, ich meine die Überreste von Meteoriten, Gaswolken, Abfall von den Schiffswerften ... Das alles ballt sich zusammen, und die kleineren Schiffe verstecken sich dahinter, um Schiffe zu attackieren, die aus dem Warp auftauchen."

languages.text: "Furibundus'un artıkları yüzünden. Ateş açmaya hazırlanan enkazlardan bahsetmiyorum ama... Meteor kalıntıları, gaz bulutları ve tersaneden gelen redden bahsediyorum. Hepsi üst üste geldi... Küçük gemiler, öteboyuttan çıkan gemilere saldırmak için bunları lehine kullanıyor."
languages.original_text: "The rubbish of Furibundus. And I'm not talking about these wrecks that are about to open fire, I mean the remains of meteorites, gas clouds, refuse from the shipyards... It all bunches together, and the smaller ships hide behind it to harass ships as they emerge from the warp."

traits.locale_text: "Furibundus'un artıkları yüzünden. Ateş açmaya hazırlanan enkazlardan bahsetmiyorum ama… Meteor kalıntıları, gaz bulutları ve tersaneden gelen redden bahsediyorum. Hepsi üst üste geldi… Küçük gemiler, öteboyuttan çıkan gemilere saldırmak için bunları lehine kullanıyor."
